title: im an youtuber and i want  to get a pbe account
body:
if you have an account to get go private 
https://www.facebook.com/ismailox.krim

replies.body: There's a lot of interest in PBE applications, but it's currently down for maintenance.  :(  Bookmark our [PBE status](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) page for the time being for updates as they come.  Hang tight!
